SEARCH

Uses of Class
model.geometry.Point

Packages that use Point
Package
Description
model
Core data models and logic for representing the game elements, including hexagons, resources, buildings, roads, and their interactions.
model.geometry
Contains classes and methods for handling the geometric calculations and coordinate systems used in the Catan game board.
model.tiles
The classes that represent the tiles of the game, and what the tiles can contain.
view
Contains the classes that are responsible for what the user sees on the screen.
view.utilities
The classes that are used to help with the view of the game.
